nodes.text: A Human male spy in the employ of the Galactic Republic infiltrated an Imperial capital ship during the Cold War, killing sixteen Imperial officers and stealing a sample of a deadly bioweapon. The spy escaped to the surface of the planet Balmorra, but was injured in the crash and died soon after hiding the sample nearby.
The Republic spy's body appears in the mission "Biohazard" for players on the Imperial version of Balmorra in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
